reviewText:
I had bought this item thinking that I have purchased Discipline for a great deal, that was merely a misconception.

Reason why I thought that I bought Discipline
1. Product picture is of Discipline vol. 1-3
2. Product details list 4 discs and 180 min (the length of the series)
3. Product discription list
Discipline The Hentai Academy Vol. 1 : Lesson 1 and 2
Discipline The Hentai Academy Vol. 2 : Lesson 3 and 4
Discipline The Hentai Academy Vol. 3 : Lesson 5 and 6
Special Photo Disc
(the 4 discs)

I even e-mailed importcd to clarify what was really being sold here and they never responded back to me. If you are selling a product on here, you need to make sure to get your facts on whatever your selling right. Do not put up info that contrendicts the title of your product.
